name: Robot Rescue - Kid's Space Adventure Game FREE
name_original: Robot Rescue - Kid's Space Adventure Game FREE
description:
Help Sparky reunite with his spaceship!

Tap, bounce, hop and jump your way across the galaxy, collecting coins and tumbling through space in this epic space adventure!

Sparky’s spaceship crash landed somewhere in Nebula 9 and he needs your help to get back. But before he can get back on the ship he needs to collect coins and trophies to repair his ship.

This is the fun space adventure game that you've been waiting for - it's easy to play and will keep your kids entertained for hours.

Let’s get Sparky back into Space!

*Great Features Include*
- Addictive Game Play
- Awesome Graphics
- Unlock Epic Powers
- Top Achievers Board
- Many Levels
- Endless Run Mode, Just Keep Going!

https://www.facebook.com/RobotsInSpaceGame
